Articles.Content:
Salutations.

As a few of you may know, I\'m a big fan of making \'community\' channels, and here\'s one.

This would be a YouTube page known as KomradesWithAK, where a select few (and auditioners) will be able to log in and add KSP videos, with permission.

Discuss...

Sign me in, but be warned.

I upload a lot. 8)

Sign me in, but be warned.

I upload a lot. 8)

You\'d need to PM me with the topic of your video.
